website_summaries.verdict: Promising to be one of the best value track spikes in the market, the Saucony Spitfire 2 boasts superior traction. Because of this quality, this track shoe is best suited for taking turns at top speed. It flaunts support and unmatched lockdown with its componentry. Achieve peak performance with a featherlight running platform—the Saucony Spitfire 2.
pros: Many of the purchasers commend the featherlight composition of the Saucony Spitfire 2
It is made of high-quality materials, stated several users
Some wearers find the track spike very comfortable
The running shoe has a good amount of support, expressed a few athletes
According to a number of buyers, it promotes a stable performance
Quite a few runners appreciate the affordability of the running spike
cons: Some have observed that it constricts foot movements
A few testers state that the sprint spike is too tight

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchased this same shoe (larger size) & love it
customer_reviews.text: my son got this shoe last year from a reputable shoe company here in town for around $100 and loved it but outgrew it. So I looked online for the same shoe, next size up and was pleased to see it offered for 1/3 the cost we paid last year!! He used it for cross country (longer spikes) in the fall and track in the spring. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Vick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I bought them for my son since he is on the school's track team. This is the first time that I have bought shoes on the internet, and I am very satisfied. The shipping was quick and the size was correct. There were no problems. My son says that the shoes are very light and comfortable. The shoes come with a set of 3/16 spikes. However, the spikes are not Pyramid Spikes, which his coach encourages, so we had to buy separate ones. The shoes provide great traction, and he has seen a reduction in his times when he runs.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: The toe box is way to small for my foot
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is way to small for my foot. I have a pair of different Saucony track shoes of the same size and they fit fine. If these fit properly, I would give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Mcgovern

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!!
customer_reviews.text: My son runs on the #1 high school 4x400 in the country. He wore these and didn't skip a beat. Might get him the same pair for his upcoming junior season. Can't beat the price and they are not bad looking.
customer_reviews.author: Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who runs hurdles. I bought a half size up because other posters mentioned they ran small. I think they were true to size as his are just a little big. He says they are very comfortable, and he's very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kfred

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for cross country and my son's time dropped quite a few seconds when switching from regular running shoes. He initially thought they did not have enough support. I added some insoles and that seemed to help.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Nice price point
customer_reviews.text: They got used for one HS Track practice and were highly liked, however the family pet loved them too and chewed them to shreds after the first use. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob McBride

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who joined the high school track team. I've heard no complaints, so that's pretty good for a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: digduga

customer_reviews.title: When you put them side by side this looks more like an 7
customer_reviews.text: This was an 8.5 and my son also had the 7. When you put them side by side this looks more like an 7.5 or 8, so I'm glad i took the risk and went with the 8.5 instead. Other than that its a really good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sprint shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Condition: New and came with spikes and key. Shoe looks exactly like the picture. Fit: As expected. Light weight. Perfect for short sprints up to 400m. Exceptional customer service!!! Shoes arrived before expected.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: i run track i was running in reebok atv 19 shoes really heavy people told me to get lighter shoes so i got these they are lighter than i thought it helped me run a lot faster and farther i went from a mile in 6.10 to 5.30 in these shoes i love them
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Pyro Campos

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shoe at a great value!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these for cross country! I will be buying him a spare pair!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are pretty darn good. Fit perfectly and are super light.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7th grader running track for the first time. They were great. The price was great. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fair, wish they'd been better
customer_reviews.text: Not made for long term use. Got barely a season out of them. Pay the extra money and get a better pair
customer_reviews.author: WalkerTalkerBassplayingStalker

customer_reviews.title: They fit my son perfect, and they helped him drop 5 seconds off ...
customer_reviews.text: Only reasons not a 5 star, is because they still had some dirt on them. They fit my son perfect, and they helped him drop 5 seconds off his mile time. I will get another pair when he out grows these.
customer_reviews.author: derek ayers

customer_reviews.title: No spikes
customer_reviews.text: Does not include spikes...don’t post pics of spikes if not included.
customer_reviews.author: Andy K Chea

customer_reviews.title: Great competition shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who does athletics. Very lightweight, great fit, gave him heaps of confidence. Definitely a top shoe for track and field competitions. He loved the colour and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Doran

customer_reviews.title: running on air
customer_reviews.text: Brought shoes for my son he runs track,said that these shoes are very comfortable feels like he is running on air.worth your money
customer_reviews.author: PRINCESS

customer_reviews.title: Look incredible but are pretty narrow even for track spikes
customer_reviews.text: Look incredible but are pretty narrow even for track spikes. Been stretching them out and hope to use tonight at track meet.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent value for the price...I have been totally pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gary J.

customer_reviews.title: They are good looking shoes and probably fine for most
customer_reviews.text: Not keeping the shoes. They are good looking shoes and probably fine for most, but we need a wider stile.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Great all around track shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Lightweight, fit like a glove. Good support and perfect traction. Using them for the 400 and 100.
customer_reviews.author: Twin B

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner shoe
customer_reviews.text: A great sprinting shoe for parents to start their kids in. Not too expensive, and they perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really good spikes for the price ($30). I like the snug strap.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Martin

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: Great spikes. Came in 2 days, just in time for my first meet. Laces are a perfect length and the Velcro strap Is dope. They look slick awell. For only 35 bucks, I'm quite pleased. You should get these.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Bardos

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: These were true to the size and we're very comfortable from the first use.
customer_reviews.author: S F

customer_reviews.title: I just got mine today and they look very nice. They were clean
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine today and they look very nice. They were clean, packaged well and the spikes were very sharp. I will definately order from here again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Dean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as expected and work just fine... Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I expected. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews were spot on. Showed up to my sons first track meet to see about five other boys with this exact shoe. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: snead

customer_reviews.title: The colors are more vivid and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The picture didn't do the shoes justice. The colors are more vivid and awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Worth

customer_reviews.title: These shoes run small in size. I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small in size. I had to return them before my son could even test them out. :(
customer_reviews.author: mblanco

customer_reviews.title: but super flashy! ordered a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: way too big! but super flashy! ordered a smaller size, fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality but i would not wear it to a track meet more like practice.
customer_reviews.author: StellarFlight

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Son is very happy with the purchase. And the order came just the day before his first track meet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Spikes were too long for the regulations of the track we use. Had to get shorter ones. Otherwise these shoes are sweet and I am fast in them.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size up and the width of the shoe was still small.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Rechcygl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These run extremely small. Couldn't even get foot in shoe. The company is helpful in exchanging for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E Fewtrell

customer_reviews.title: ... at her track meets and she says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears these at her track meets and she says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The plastic at the front was lifting but due to not having anymore available to us we have kept the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. They came the day I needed them most and they are so light. They will definitely help with my speed. I will edit my post after my track meet tonight and letcha know how it goes. The spikes were amazing! I did so much better with these than I did last time. I am very happy with these spikes and I highly, highly suggest them!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my track season and they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kolby James George

customer_reviews.title: so not expected to be comfortable when worn for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: Its a sprint shoe, so not expected to be comfortable when worn for long periods of time. Throw them on, run fast, take them off. Bought these for my son who is on track. He likes them.
customer_reviews.author: RVincent

customer_reviews.title: WOAH!!
customer_reviews.text: A first year member of our Track team got these shoe ...and the rest is nothing but good. This is a quality shoe at at quality price.Mike
customer_reviews.author: Mike Puncsak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daighter loved it. She cant wait to wear it during track season
customer_reviews.author: lanu lewis

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the perfect price too
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! Lightweight and he can fly in his triple jump!! A friend of his wants a pair now!! Thanks for the perfect price too!
customer_reviews.author: christine j copp

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong color, ordered black and received red. My grandson is okay with the color.
customer_reviews.author: zztoddw

customer_reviews.title: He says they fit perfect and is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes for my son. He says they fit perfect and is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond V. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes my son likes them and he won his race
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I originally returned a pair that was too small for this size 7.5. The shipping was quick. My son is very happy with the shoes, no complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: tango

customer_reviews.title: this item is good for a child and not as advertised for man`s
customer_reviews.text: this item is good for a child and not as advertised for man`s,becarefull choosing this item, make sure you have the width, and size which they dont provide. otherwise do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fact is these are not worth one star but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fact is these are not worth one star but I had to give something. I wear a size 10.5 and ordered an 11 to be safe if these are a 9 I'm an hedgehog. The color is not as shown, they are completely Pimp Pink, OK a tag beyond the pale A pimp wouldn't wear them. and if you use the return slip you still end up paying a third the price save yourself the pain.
customer_reviews.author: linda mason

customer_reviews.title: Spikes missing
customer_reviews.text: My main issue is that one pair came without the spikes and I don't know why
customer_reviews.author: Fitzj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son he loves the fit & fill of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Ezra Ladler

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son really like these shoes. He says they fit great and feel good when he's running the 200m or for when he's doing the long or triple jump. They also look good.
customer_reviews.author: agrick
